UpdateCardAction, ViewScheduledPaymentAction, ViewTransactionAction

    public abstract class BaseFormAction
extends BaseAction
    Action used for common for actions, that handler 3 states:
    • Form preparation: The first request, usually a get2-state case: the first request prepares the form and the second is a form submission
    Author:
    luis
